messages.content:
Count the number of birds in the figure, including those that are only showing their heads. To ensure accuracy, first detect their key points, then give the total number..
![image](https://qianwen-res.oss-accelerate-overseas.aliyuncs.com/Qwen2.5-VL/grounding_counting_birds_draw.png)

```json
[
	{"point_2d": ["38", "314"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["126", "309"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["195", "277"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["243, 291"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["285, 291"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["345, 291"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["400, 284"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["465, 298"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["525, 314"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["644, 314"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["695, 314"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["762, 304"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["834, 264"], "label": "birds"},
	{"point_2d": ["248, 638"], "label": "birds"}
]
```
There are a total of 14 birds in the figure.
